nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.model

Class HangMan

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.mprog.apps.hangman11079592.model.HangMan

  • public class HangMan
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is primarily responsible for setting global constant values and as a container for globally used models.
